name: Conductor Demo
description:
Hello, It's me frozi033! It's my first project and I load my game on this site, because I'm need feeback to know is it worth refining the story and gameplay.  Game is very small, but I think this is enough for first project. You can support me with a donation, but I don't insist.

The world was plunged into a zombie Apocalypse due to the explosions of nuclear power plants. You play as an ordinary conductor who searches for safe paths to other shelters, and then guides civilian survivors through them.(This is the concept of the story and the gameplay of the demo version does not quite match it).
